title: Trading Platform: Withdrawal (request)
description: This call allows withdrawal from Trading account to a wallet account.

amount.description: Amount to withdraw (in the currency of the Trading account).

from_account.description: Trading account login to withdraw money from.

to_account.description: Wallet account loginid to transfer money to.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
